_sText: Readme: Its my very first map ever ! I never used Hammer before but i wanted to make a own surfmap. So i read some tutoruals here on FPS and SOLIDSURF (and google ^^) and started with this map. So credits to all the guys who posted good tutorials. And of curse our players on our speedserver [ 85.14.216.193:27016 ] (20 betaversions to the final... puh!). And Valve for all dusty things (textures,models,ect.) Map made in april/may 2007 (80-90 hours). Mapinfos: Ist a dust-styled surf map in two stages. Its a big map so i recommend the MAPTIME TO 4.0 or more! The first stage leads you to a small platform and second one leads you to weapons or (lower one) directly to the battlefield/jail. There is a bombspot at the end of the map and the jail can be escaped with a teammate ^^ ... so please give me some nice comments and have fun with this map - Rebell
